actor_awards.notes: A prolific character actor best known for his roles as Mexican bandits in Westerns, despite being a Jewish method actor from Brooklyn. He received an Honorary Academy Award in 2010 for being 'the quintessential chameleon'.

filmography.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
filmography.role_description: The 'Ugly' of the title, a resilient, fast-talking, and morally ambiguous Mexican bandit searching for buried gold.
filmography.plot: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

filmography.title: The Magnificent Seven
filmography.role_description: The ruthless and philosophical bandit leader who terrorizes a Mexican farming village.
filmography.plot: Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.
filmography.awards: Laurel Award: Nomination – Top Action Performance

filmography.title: Baby Doll
filmography.role_description: A cunning Sicilian cotton gin owner who seeks revenge against a rival by seducing his childlike wife. Wallach's film debut.
filmography.plot: A child bride holds her husband at bay while a rival businessman tries to seduce her.
filmography.awards: BAFTA Film Award: Win – Most Promising Newcomer to Film

filmography.title: The Godfather Part III
filmography.role_description: An aging, treacherous mob boss and old friend of the Corleone family who plots against Michael.
filmography.plot: In the midst of trying to legitimize his business dealings in New York and Italy in 1979, aging Mafia Don Michael Corleone seeks to avow for his sins, while taking his nephew Vincent Mancini under his wing.

filmography.title: The Holiday
filmography.role_description: A legendary screenwriter from Hollywood's Golden Age who befriends a heartbreak-stricken Iris.
filmography.plot: Two women troubled with guy-problems swap homes in each other's countries, where they each meet a local guy and fall in love.

filmography.title: The Misfits
filmography.role_description: A widowed pilot and mechanic who joins a group of outcasts mustanging in the Nevada desert.
filmography.plot: A divorcée falls for an over-the-hill cowboy while staying at a Nevada ranch with a couple of other cowboys.

filmography.title: How the West Was Won
filmography.role_description: A menacing outlaw who targets a marshal and his family in the 'The Outlaws' segment.
filmography.plot: A family saga covering several decades of Westward expansion in the 19th century, including the Gold Rush, the Civil War, and the building of the railroads.

filmography.title: The Lineup
filmography.role_description: A psychopathic hitman who retrieves heroin packages from unsuspecting travelers.
filmography.plot: A brilliant but unstable hitman and his mentor travel through San Francisco recovering heroin packages carried by unwitting tourists.

filmography.title: How to Steal a Million
filmography.role_description: A wealthy American art collector obsessed with owning the Venus of Cellini.
filmography.plot: A woman who must steal a statue from a Paris museum to help conceal her father's art forgeries is assisted by a man who isn't what he seems.

filmography.title: Lord Jim
filmography.role_description: A warlord who enslaves a local tribe, becoming the antagonist to the titular character.
filmography.plot: After being discredited as a coward, a 19th-century seaman lives for a time in a Malayan village and finds redemption.

filmography.title: Seven Thieves
filmography.role_description: A saxophonist and safecracker recruited for a high-stakes heist in Monte Carlo.
filmography.plot: An aging professor recruits a team of experts to rob the vaults of a Monte Carlo casino.

filmography.title: Cinderella Liberty
filmography.role_description: A sailor who was discharged from the Navy but cannot let go of his past life.
filmography.plot: A lonely Navy sailor falls in love with a hooker and becomes a surrogate father figure for her son.

filmography.title: Mackenna's Gold
filmography.role_description: A gambler and one of the many gold-seekers chasing a legendary canyon of gold.
filmography.plot: A marshal is kidnapped by a gangster who believes the lawman knows the way to a secret canyon of gold.

filmography.title: Nuts
filmography.role_description: A court-appointed psychiatrist whose competency evaluation is challenged by the defendant.
filmography.plot: A high-class call girl accused of murder fights for the right to stand trial rather than be declared mentally incompetent.

filmography.title: Winter Kills
filmography.role_description: A nightclub owner and mechanic who claims to have information about a presidential assassination.
filmography.plot: The younger brother of an assassinated US President is led to a dying man who claims to be the assassin, sparking a new investigation.

filmography.title: The Hunter
filmography.role_description: The bail bondsman who employs the legendary bounty hunter Ralph 'Papa' Thorson.
filmography.plot: The true story of Ralph 'Papa' Thorson, a modern-day bounty hunter who chases down bail jumpers.

filmography.title: Tough Guys
filmography.role_description: A nearly blind hitman hired to kill two aging train robbers.
filmography.plot: Two elderly gangsters are released from prison only to find they have trouble fitting in as old men who still like to raise hell.

filmography.title: Movie Movie
filmography.role_description: Plays dual roles in this double-feature parody of 1930s cinema: a boxing promoter and a theatrical producer.
filmography.plot: A double feature of 1930s-style movies: a boxing picture and a Busby Berkeley-style musical.

filmography.title: Ace High
filmography.role_description: A wily Greek bandit who steals from the protagonists but eventually teams up with them.
filmography.plot: Two gunmen and a saloon owner team up to get revenge on a bandit who stole their money.

filmography.title: Girlfriends
filmography.role_description: A sympathetic rabbi who employs and has an affair with the protagonist.
filmography.plot: A young photographer struggles with her career and personal life after her roommate moves out to get married.

filmography.title: The Deep
filmography.role_description: A local treasure hunter in Bermuda with a dark secret about a sunken ship.
filmography.plot: A pair of amateur skin divers discover the wreckage of a WWII cargo ship in Bermuda and get involved in a dangerous drug conflict.

filmography.title: The Brain
filmography.role_description: A Sicilian mobster who gets entangled in a complex train robbery plot.
filmography.plot: A man plans a train robbery but discovers that another criminal mastermind known as 'The Brain' has the same idea.

filmography.title: Genghis Khan
filmography.role_description: The ruler of the Khwarezmian Empire who comes into conflict with Genghis Khan.
filmography.plot: A depiction of the life and conquests of the Mongol emperor Genghis Khan.

filmography.title: Keeping the Faith
filmography.role_description: The senior rabbi who mentors Ben Stiller's character.
filmography.plot: A rabbi and a priest dealing with the complexities of their faiths fall in love with the same woman.

filmography.title: The Ghost Writer
filmography.role_description: A mysterious local on Martha's Vineyard who provides a crucial clue to the protagonist.
filmography.plot: A ghostwriter hired to complete the memoirs of a former British Prime Minister uncovers secrets that put his own life in jeopardy.

filmography.title: Wall Street: Money Never Sleeps
filmography.role_description: An old-school investment banker and patriarch of a financial firm. Wallach's final film role.
filmography.plot: Gordon Gekko gets out of prison and teams up with his future son-in-law to repair his relationship with his daughter and take down a financial enemy.
